DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety low dose transdermal contraceptive delivery system contain ethinyl estradiol levonorgestrel .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Contraceptive Efficacy/Safety Low Dose EE/LNG Transdermal Contraceptive Delivery System
DOC.detailed_description: Comparative evaluation AG200-15 versus OC regard safety , contraceptive efficacy , cycle control ( bleed pattern ) , subject compliance serum concentration EE LNG . To evaluate TCDS wearability ( include adhesion ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy female 17 ( state legal age consent receive contraceptive 17 ) 40 year Regular , consistent menstrual cycle 25 35 day Sexually active woman request birth control In good general health , confirm medical history , physical ( include gynecologic ) examination screen laboratory value Known suspected pregnancy ; Lactating woman Significant skin reaction transdermal preparation sensitivity surgical / medical tape Any disease may worsen hormonal treatment ( cardiovascular , liver , metabolic ) Use contraceptive method study medication
